H0.text: River Phoenix died during the making of which movie. My Own Private Idaho

H1.text: River Phoenix died during the making of which movie. Stand by Me

H2.text: River Phoenix died during the making of which movie. Running on Empty

H3.text: River Phoenix died during the making of which movie. Dark Blood

A4.text: Production on the film was halted due to the death of Phoenix in 1993, shortly before the end of the project (it would also be the final film made by Sluizer) and remained unfinished for 19 years.

A5.text: It was the last film to feature River Phoenix and the only film in which Phoenix portrayed a villain.
